xyz.fsgik.common.net

类 FsServerStates

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.fsgik.common.net.FsServerStates

  • public class FsServerStates
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents server states.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int CLOSED
      Closed state: the channel or endpoint has been closed.
      static int CREATED
      Created state: the channel or endpoint never open or close.
      static int OPENED
      Opened state: the channel or endpoint has been opened.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      FsServerStates() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Sets state to CLOSED.
      int getState()
      Returns current state: CREATED, OPENED or CLOSED.
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns whether current state is CLOSED.
      boolean isCreated()
      Returns whether current state is CREATED.
      boolean isOpened()
      Returns whether current state is OPENED.
      void open()
      Sets state to OPENED.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • CREATED

        public static final int CREATED
        Created state: the channel or endpoint never open or close. This is the initialized state.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • OPENED

        public static final int OPENED
        Opened state: the channel or endpoint has been opened.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • CLOSED

        public static final int CLOSED
        Closed state: the channel or endpoint has been closed.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
